attributes.action: Hold a bank holiday on Fri 25/06/2021
attributes.additional_details: To honour all those people who have been lost to covid-19.
attributes.background: Many people will be missing out on seeing love ones especially if they are elderly, vulnerable or shielding.  Travel will be horrendous many people will decide it's just not worth travelling.  People will suffer with their mental health because of the virus and Christmas being a non event for them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554630
